phrases: They put up the new Mirage Saga work.
Why the hell are you so confident?!
Even if it gets to me, I cannot do anything about it!
We will have a problem if you do not start taking me seriously.
You were just so cute, I could not help teasing you.
Shima-chan, you are such a troublemaker!
Get Your Valentine's Day Fired Up!
Send chocolates to a Mirage character!
Send chocolates to a Mirage Saga character!
Apparently, whoever wins gets an illustration by the character designer!
Plus, the designer will sign and make it out to the winner!
First, I have got to consider the design...
I want to talk to Serinuma-senpai.
For some reason, I do not want you within a two meter radius of her.
Why do not you back off, then?
Senpai, did you hear about the Valentine's collaboration?
Are you trying for it, too, Shima-chan?
I am still thinking about it, but I have got a few ideas.
And this is just a suggestion,
but how about we test our recipes together?
How could you ask her that?
Oh, it is fine if you two come as well.
Shall we call Mutsumi-senpai and Shinomiya-kun, too?
Then you would be at ease, right?
Besides, it might be fun to see you boys watch us
make chocolates you will never get.
All right, if you are going to go that far, we will go!
Character chocolates is a pretty classic choice.
Today's just for prep, so how about we give it a try?
First, choose a picture you want to make in chocolate.
Is not this from my doujinshi?
It is a Shion illustration by Yokoshima-sensei.
Should I have asked you first?
If I am able to help you out at all, it makes me happy.
So what do we do after that?
Then, copy the picture onto parchment paper with a pencil.
After that, flip it, and trace again with a chocolate pen.
Then you put it in the fridge until it hardens.
Then you fill it in with colored chocolate.
And then you take off the parchment paper.
I bet you could seriously win with this!
Shion's beauty does not come through at all!
Besides, I am sure lots of people are doing character chocolates.
If you want to stand out, something else would be better.
Let us aim for that star together!
I think mine's pretty good, too.
Why are you three trying so hard?
Why is not she improving at all?
Was I always this bad at figuring out how 3-D things look?
It is like, I start, it does not feel right, and then I just make it worse and worse.
If this keeps up, I might not make the deadline!
First, try to have fun with it.
What are you tryin' to pull?
My gut's telling me not to let you anywhere near Serinuma!
We are both girls, so there should not be anything to worry about.
Personally, I think their gut feeling is dead-on.
If not, what is your motive behind all this?
I like things that are cute and beautiful.
So, I am attracted to her, that is all.
So you are just into her looks?
Well, obviously, it is not just that.
It is terrible, is not it?!
I have worked on it for so long, I cannot tell!
It is got a feeling that only you could bring, Serinuma-san.
if it is all right, please submit mine using your name.
Is not the deadline tomorrow, though?
If you want to win, is not Nishina's chocolate the way to go?
Well, he does have a point.
Even though I practiced so much...
You ended up sending in the one you made?
Was there something wrong with the one I made?
It was supposed to be a Valentine's chocolate, right?
I remembered that chocolate is a gift.
I know it was poorly done, but I put all my feelings into it.
So I wanted to send that one.
So, Shima-chan, I am so sorry!
It is what makes you wonderful.
This is a token of my thanks for always getting along with me.
So you are just into her looks?
If anything, would not that be you?
It was all about her looks at the start.
I do not want to give her up.
At that time, I did not know...
That the day would come where my feelings would be put to the test.
Why are you so, you know... that!
Well, you know, I had so much failed Valentine's chocolate left over.
It would have been a waste to toss it, right?
It is not good for your health to have your weight fluctuate suddenly.
I will go call the teacher!
Get a hold of yourself, Shinomiya-kun!
If I go to sleep and wake up again, she will go back to normal.
We got to get her to lose weight!
I get you, but there is nothing we can really do.
I know she is got a good personality,
and I know she is mega cute when she is thin.
So there is only one option!
I prefer a beauty with a good personalty over a beast with a good personality!
You are so honest that it disgusts me.
I can really have all of this?
Well, she is gotten so round and soft.
I just want to feed her lots and lots!
Do not drive him into a corner!
Shima-chan was throwing a party for me.
It said my chocolate got the special prize.
Apparently the judges really liked it.
And so, I have been invited to the award ceremony!
The director, voice actors, and character designer will be there.
All the staff I admire are coming!
Does not it make you want to do your best to dress yourself up?
Let us get character nails done!
You will meet people you admire, right?
Let us have you meet them looking your best.
Got To push'them while their morale's still high!
Hey, why are you doing this?
I do realize she looks a tad chubby now, but...
Go get your eyes checked out!
I am going to do my best for Mirage Saga!
I am going to do five sets of 20 squats!
K-Kae-chan, you look like you are about to die.
Her figure has not changed much, but she looks so depressed!
Dammit, she is been so physically active, so why?
Maybe if I add more to her workout...
Do not push her too hard.
If I am not tough on her, she will never change!
Besides, do not you want her back to normal as fast as possible, too?
But, you know how her workout is.
We are going to change part of your plan.
Are not they all audience members?
You see a lot of it at events for female voice actors.
It is called otagei because otaku can do it, right?
I could pull it off with a little practice.
Wh-Why do you look so grossed out?!
All right then, how about we all give it a try?
Otagei is fun because you do it as a group.
And do not you think that will give Serinuma-senpai the best support?
And it is a real workout!
How about we take a break?
It is not good to push your body too much.
You are all doing it together with me, after all!
What was that sound... just now?
Can we put a stop to this weight loss thing?
This happened because you pushed her too hard.
Plus, you are too aggressive, Nanashima-senpai.
I was just trying to help!
You are the one who pushed her the most.
It is basically you that got her hurt!
Whether she quits or keeps going
I will take her home today.
It is all because I suggested otagei.
Sorry for causing such a fuss.
Shima-chan took me to school this morning, too.
Do not hurt yourself again, okay?
If you need anything, let me know!
It is right there, so I am good.
Shall I pull down your panties?!
You seemed at a loss when I saw you, so I just brought you here.
To be honest, you did help me.
I do understand that she is worrying about you, though.
Everyone is so worried about me, even though it is my fault for getting carried away.
I have caused a lot of trouble.
I am pumping myself up again!
Everyone is been helping me so much!
And above all, I was the one who decided to do my best for Mirage Saga!
So I got to see this through!
Serinuma-san is always so bright and positive, and never gives up.
You have not changed at all.
That is not what I mean.
Right now, I have fallen in love with her all over again.
It is not trivial with a difference this big!
You are saying you are okay with this?!
Is not she wonderful, even now?
Do not start spewing the same stuff as Nishina, idiot!
You really intend to start working out again?
Thanks for sticking with me again!
You know I always want to support you, Serinuma-san.
But if you will hurt yourself again, I am against it.
I will be careful, so do not worry!
But, you have still set the deadline to be the award ceremony, right?
It looks like it is our turn!
Have you come up with another lame idea?
Anyway, why are you two holding hands?
To think you do not even understand that.
Serinuma cannot take her eyes off us!
We know Serinuma reflexively latches onto anything BL.
So we came up with a plan.
A pic of us in any pose you would like!
If she meets her quota, we will do something together in front of her!
How many points is a hug?!
Um, that is a weight loss of 3 kilos.
If you push yourself, you will hurt yourself again.
It is fine to take your time.
You are quite kind to her.
Is not it natural to be kind to the person you like?
To be honest, I was at a loss when I saw her like she is now,
because I thought it was her looks I was attracted to.
I found myself attracted to her cheerfulness and honesty.
That is why I want to be kind to her, and do whatever I can for her.
I have to say, that spirit of yours might be a bit beautiful.
It was so hard, and there were times I got depressed and wanted to give up,
but you were all there to motivate me!
I could not have done it without you!
W-We really did our best, too.
I am glad our hard work paid off.
Now all that is left is this,
Achievement Bonus: Igarashi will kiss Nana.
I added it to give her further incentive.
Show us that beautiful spirit of yours.
And so, the Mirage Saga Valentine's Project Award Ceremony
There was a fight in my class today,
and I somehow ended up having to deal with it.
I told them fighting is for people too much free time,
and they did not take it well.
Shinomiya-kun, you do not get into fights?
I cannot say I much like getting into arms with others.
I would rather deal with the iguana.
Next time: Let The Shipping Wars Begin!
Mutsumi-san, do you never get into fights?
